latest_changelog.zh_cn:
- 建筑工现在在建完建筑后会尝试清理仓库，冷却时间由取货优先级决定
- 矿工现在在离开岗位时会尝试先回到工作方块处
- 食物惩罚点数/食物奖励点数现在可以在设置中调整
latest_changelog.en_us:
- Builders now attempt to clear the warehouse after finishing a building, cooldown depends on pickup priority  
- Miners now try to return to their work block before leaving the job  
- Food penalty/reward points are now configurable in settings

latest_stable_changelog.zh_cn: 测试修改了更新日志，如无必要可以不更新，这其实就是 1.0.3-BETA-3.1 测试结果相对稳定后发布的 release 版本
latest_stable_changelog.en_us: Test modification of the update reminder; version is not necessary, just update a stable release version of 1.0.3-BETA-3.1.
